comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: The original caption is misspelled--this is apparently a demonstration of the TRUDGEN or TRUDGEON stroke, after John Arthur Trudgen (or Trudgeon), a British swim instructor in the 1870s: www.ehow.com/how_6241_swim-trudgen-stroke.html

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thanks!  We'll change the spelling in the source data and reload the description.
